body: Hi Claudio, That is an issue with the new  solveAdjc component. I changed the tolerance to get it to work for now until I can figure out why it is happening. Good that the rest of the issues are gone. Mostapha [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/oto4-hHdKDH43dduBi12jKcWdhq1OntjcYKbUdaCZBEefPnE*OsAU-7IO8TZMe4cPiWlUTegOzYLZVT2BnsEaC7X0AnuWwoG/adjcIssue.png)
